t: Matthew 19
And*p it came to pass, that when Jesus had finished these sayings, he departed from Galilee, and came into the coasts of Judaea beyond Jordan;
And*p great multitudes followed him; and he healed them there.
The*p Pharisees also came unto him, tempting him, and saying unto him, Is it lawful for a man to put away his wife for every cause?
And*p he answered and said unto them, Have*r ye*r not*r read,*r that*r he*r which*r made*r them*r at*r the*r beginning*r made*r them*r male*r and*r female,*r
And*rp said,*r For*r this*r cause*r shall*r a*r man*r leave*r father*r and*r mother,*r and*r shall*r cleave*r to*r his*r wife:*r and*r they*r twain*r shall*r be*r one*r flesh?*r
Wherefore*rp they*r are*r no*r more*r twain,*r but*r one*r flesh.*r What*r therefore*r God*r hath*r joined*r together,*r let*r not*r man*r put*r asunder.*r
They*p say unto him, Why did Moses then command to give a writing of divorcement, and to put her away?
He*p saith unto them, Moses*r because*r of*r the*r hardness*r of*r your*r hearts*r suffered*r you*r to*r put*r away*r your*r wives:*r but*r from*r the*r beginning*r it*r was*r not*r so.*r

And*rp I*r say*r unto*r you,*r Whosoever*r shall*r put*r away*r his*r wife,*r except*r it*r be*r for*r fornication,*r and*r shall*r marry*r another,*r committeth*r adultery:*r and*r whoso*r marrieth*r her*r which*r is*r put*r away*r doth*r commit*r adultery.*r
His*p disciples say unto him, If the case of the man be so with his wife, it is not good to marry.
But*p he said unto them, All*r men*r cannot*r receive*r this*r saying,*r save*r they*r to*r whom*r it*r is*r given.*r

For*rp there*r are*r some*r eunuchs,*r which*r were*r so*r born*r from*r their*r mother's*r womb:*r and*r there*r are*r some*r eunuchs,*r which*r were*r made*r eunuchs*r of*r men:*r and*r there*r be*r eunuchs,*r which*r have*r made*r themselves*r eunuchs*r for*r the*r kingdom*r of*r heaven's*r sake.*r He*r that*r is*r able*r to*r receive*r it,*r let*r him*r receive*r it.*r
Then*p were there brought unto him little children, that he should put his hands on them, and pray: and the disciples rebuked them.
But*p Jesus said, Suffer*r little*r children,*r and*r forbid*r them*r not,*r to*r come*r unto*r me:*r for*r of*r such*r is*r the*r kingdom*r of*r heaven.*r
And*p he laid his hands on them, and departed thence.
And,*p behold, one came and said unto him, Good Master, what good thing shall I do, that I may have eternal life?
And*p he said unto him, Why*r callest*r thou*r me*r good?*r there*r is*r none*r good*r but*r one,*r that*r is,*r God:*r but*r if*r thou*r wilt*r enter*r into*r life,*r keep*r the*r commandments.*r
He*p saith unto him, Which? Jesus said, Thou*r shalt*r do*r no*r murder,*r Thou*r shalt*r not*r commit*r adultery,*r Thou*r shalt*r not*r steal,*r Thou*r shalt*r not*r bear*r false*r witness,*r
Honour*rp thy*r father*r and*r thy*r mother:*r and,*r Thou*r shalt*r love*r thy*r neighbour*r as*r thyself.*r
The*p young man saith unto him, All these things have I kept from my youth up: what lack I yet?

Jesus*p said unto him, If*r thou*r wilt*r be*r perfect,*r go*r and*r sell*r that*r thou*r hast,*r and*r give*r to*r the*r poor,*r and*r thou*r shalt*r have*r treasure*r in*r heaven:*r and*r come*r and*r follow*r me.*r
But*p when the young man heard that saying, he went away sorrowful: for he had great possessions.
Then*p said Jesus unto his disciples, Verily*r I*r say*r unto*r you,*r That*r a*r rich*r man*r shall*r hardly*r enter*r into*r the*r kingdom*r of*r heaven.*r

And*rp again*r I*r say*r unto*r you,*r It*r is*r easier*r for*r a*r camel*r to*r go*r through*r the*r eye*r of*r a*r needle,*r than*r for*r a*r rich*r man*r to*r enter*r into*r the*r kingdom*r of*r God.*r
When*p his disciples heard it, they were exceedingly amazed, saying, Who then can be saved?
But*p Jesus beheld them, and said unto them, With*r men*r this*r is*r impossible;*r but*r with*r God*r all*r things*r are*r possible.*r
Then*p answered Peter and said unto him, Behold, we have forsaken all, and followed thee; what shall we have therefore?

And*p Jesus said unto them, Verily*r I*r say*r unto*r you,*r That*r ye*r which*r have*r followed*r me,*r in*r the*r regeneration*r when*r the*r Son*r of*r man*r shall*r sit*r in*r the*r throne*r of*r his*r glory,*r ye*r also*r shall*r sit*r upon*r twelve*r thrones,*r judging*r the*r twelve*r tribes*r of*r Israel.*r

And*rp every*r one*r that*r hath*r forsaken*r houses,*r or*r brethren,*r or*r sisters,*r or*r father,*r or*r mother,*r or*r wife,*r or*r children,*r or*r lands,*r for*r my*r name's*r sake,*r shall*r receive*r an*r hundredfold,*r and*r shall*r inherit*r everlasting*r life.*r
But*rp many*r that*r are*r first*r shall*r be*r last;*r and*r the*r last*r shall*r be*r first.*r
